imdb.plot outline: X-Play, TV's gaming source, feeds your daily gaming addiction. We cover the entire gaming industry and feature world premiere hands on demos, up-to-the minute breaking news, game previews, and behind-the-scenes developer exclusives. X-Play is much more than just brutally honest game reviews. It's the center of the gaming universe!
imdb.title: X-Play Weekly
